-based trash can: 	* This trash can uses a machine learning model to identify the contents of the trash.
Smart trash can: 	* This trash can uses sensors to monitor the amount of waste in the bin and alert the user when it's full.
Self-cleaning trash can: 	* This trash can uses a self-cleaning mechanism to remove waste from the bin.
Recycling-focused trash can: 	* This trash can is designed to encourage recycling by providing clear labels and instructions for sorting waste.
Solar-powered trash can: 	* This trash can uses solar panels to power its features, such as sorting and cleaning mechanisms.
